sub_title: Independent Art Historian, researcher and lecturer; Chairman at Stichting Historische Behangsels en Wanddecoraties
summary: I am an art historian specialised in decorative arts and design, with the historic interior as my particular field of expertise, and a focus on decorative painting and historic wallpaper. I work as an independent researcher and as a guest lecturer at the Universities of Amsterdam and Leiden and the Hogeschool of Utrecht. Since 2007 I have worked as researcher or as advisor on a great number of projects, for clients that included individuals, art dealers and institutions such as the Delft Technical University, Museum van Loon, the Rijksmuseum, the Cultural Heritage Agency (Rijksdienst voor het Cultureel Erfgoed) and the Government Buildings Agency (Rijksgebouwendienst).
